content: fun to make this chic little bag is perfect for the on-the-go gal stitched in red heart granny square all in one you ll create 4 granny motifs that step into place with no color changes thanks to the yarn granny squares use double_crochet in rounds while straps are worked in double_crochet and single_crochet techniques finished with an essential zipper sewn on by hand this perfect little bag is ready when you are red heart® all in one™ granny square™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m citrus twist 2002 1 ball 3 granny squares +160 yds/146 m for edging and strap or 250 yds/228 m total approx 17 43 cm wide x 6½ 16 5 cm deep excluding strap
